name: English Muffin Pizzas
description: We’re throwing a pizza party and the whole family’s invited! English muffin pizzas are a fun, easy way to give new life to leftovers. They’re great for school lunch upgrades—your kids won’t be bringing these back in their lunchboxes, guaranteed—or dinner in a dash, when life gets hectic. Recruit your tiny chefs to help assemble and create their own mini pizza masterpieces!

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Pizza Seasoning
lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Split muffins and arrange halves, cut side up, on pan. Lightly brush with oil. Bake 4 min, or until muffin halves are just starting to turn golden.
Spread 1 tbsp sauce over each muffin half and sprinkle each with 1 tbsp cheese. Arrange 4 meatball quarters over each muffin.
Bake 10 min, until cheese is melted and muffins are browned on the edges.
tips: CLASSIC PEPPERONI: Marinara Sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni slices.
HAWAIIAN: Marinara Sauce, pineapple chunks, and diced, deli ham.
CHICKEN ALFREDO: Alfredo Sauce, leftover shredded chicken, diced mushrooms, and chopped spinach.
Want bacon bits? Lay 4 slices of bacon over Multipurpose Tray in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high 4–5 min, or until crispy. Chop into small pieces to top pizzas.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Italian Meatball Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: You’ve gotta love a juicy meatball! Our gluten free blends makes perfectly shaped, moist meatballs that are the perfect partners for spaghetti and marinara sauce, stuffed into sandwiches, smashed onto pizza, or added to soup. Make a big batch and freeze them to use whenever your meatball craving strikes!

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavors and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!

products.name: Rosée Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Tired of the same old pasta? It’s time to take it to the next level with something a little fancy but oh-so-easy to make: Rosée Sauce. Creamy with a rich tomato flavour, this thick sauce is very family-friendly and easily clings to your favourite noodles. Make it with two simple ingredients, milk and tomato paste, in just five minutes in the microwave!
